Welcome to Ireaneus Linux Cheat Sheets webpage

Linux command line cheat sheets website

View on GitHub

To show some text in ASCII Art:

figlet Cheat

__ _ _

/ | | __ __ | |

#| | | ‘_ \ / _ \/ ` | | #| || | | | _/ (| | |_

_|_| |_|_|_,|_|

#

To have some text with color and other options:

Show with a border

toilet -F border Cheat

Basic show (filled)

toilet Cheat

mmm # m

m” “ # mm mmm mmm mm#mm

# #” # #” # “ #

# # # #”””” m”””#

“mmm” # # “#mm” “mm”# “mm

#
